short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A task timer that allows for easy task management inside of chrome.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Task:Timer is a Chrome extension that helps with better time management. The extension allows you to set 2 consecutive timers. The first timer is the work timer, and the second timer is the break timer. Once both timers are set you can then start them. This method of working follows the Pomodoro Technique.

How to Use:
go to https://github.com/DomGiarrusso/Task-Timer?tab=readme-ov-file#%EF%B8%8F-usage
